name: Bitfarm
description: Bitfarm (BFE) is a token created by Bitfarm network which is the mining farm company that run crypto mining powered by hydroelectric energy. By holding this token, you receive a bonus/dividend called BFEcash. The bonus you receive is 50% of the farm generated income. So you can do the maths that if the volume and amount of bitcoins traded increases on exchange, the bonus of holding the BFE will increase as well.
